## VirtualFolder type

Represents the data of a Virtual Folder: an Organizational Item that dynamically collects its contents.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type VirtualFolder = OrganizationalItem & {
    ApprovalStatus?: Link;
    Description?: string;
    TypeSchema?: Link;
    WorkflowInfo?: WorkflowInfo;
};
```

**References:** [OrganizationalItem](./open-api-client.organizationalitem.md)<!-- -->, [Link](./open-api-client.link.md)<!-- -->, [WorkflowInfo](./open-api-client.workflowinfo.md)
